title: 'Therapy Culture goes online' interview with Chloe Wakeham
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Chloe Wakeham who is a second year PhD student at Swansea University looking at online mental health communities and identities. Chloe uses a mixed methods study (Netnography and Ethnographic content analysis) in her research of mental health discourses and language on the platforms of Twitter and Tumblr.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
